def getIntervalTime():
    "获取检测间隔时间"
    return disk.DISK_DELAY

    
def check(path):
    "检测是否超出预警"
    r=os.popen("df -h "+path)
    for line in r:
        data=line.rstrip()
    datas=re.split(r'\s+',data)
    used=datas[4].encode("UTF-8").replace("%","")
    return int(used) < disk.DISK_USED,data
pattern_desc: Potential command injection due to os.system usage.
